content: blanket of carnation magick copyright © mary burkett 2024 1 about carnation magick carnations the birth flower of january carry potent energies of heart healing remembrance and renewal traditionally linked to grief and the passage of time they also offer magickal support for beauty love vigor and perspective associated with the fire element and ruled by saturn and jupiter carnations blend endurance with expansion making them a powerful ally for transformation and emotional clarity this blanket invites you to honor what has passed embrace what is blooming and wrap yourself in the warmth of rebirth magickal moment carnations bloom in the heart of winter reminding us that beauty and strength endure as you knit this blanket invite the fire element to warm your spirit and renew your perspective you may wish to place a red or white carnation nearby light a candle and speak by flame and thread i mend the heart grief transforms love restarts this blanket holds space for healing remembrance and rebirth knit with intention and let each stitch be a step toward vitality and peace pattern details gauge 18 stitches x 24 row = 6 in x 6 in abbreviations finished dimensions 49 in x
